Reviews.Content: mostly pleased hotel rooms clean staff friendly location central breakfast offered extensive albeit standard options pool top building unfortunately chance try looked great bit small perhaps swimming great fun water moreover spa also located top floor internet connection free times training room consisted bike leg machine moreover found hotel bit lobby big never get say hello receptionist dining room large usually also avoid contact staff chatting talking staff many persons working found impossible maybe business people ask bothered personally prefer smaller hotel chat bit locals maybe get tip go see hotel built gets business last thing annoyed pay 5 per night keep hotel safe honestly would expected free fee paid find difficult manage without safe barcelona

Reviews.Content: wife 13 yr old son stayed catalonia barcelona plaza four nights aug satisfied stay hotel conveniently located plaza espana major metro bus lines also first stop last stop barcelona convenient airport bus happy stay rambla due quiet space short ride took triple room due son clean good size none views unless courtyard idea view staff pleasant helpful knowledgable wanted wireless pool hotel former worked well latter nice due warm humid weather experienced one pool 2 meters deep problem one smaller children one thing hotel must work overall would highly recommend hotel return go barcelona

Reviews.Content: wonderful hotel clean free wifi good room nice view espanya room lovely reception reservations located good reach breakfast wonderful

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised”

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and nice hotel”

Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed hotel 2 nights weekend loved great location clean staff helpful wifi free

Reviews.Title: “pleasant stay, flexible staff, nice breakfast”
Reviews.Author: BasV1976
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel 4 nights two triple rooms rooms spacious clean one room need furniture television called front desk first day told would look went everyday four days upon checking dissapointment tv matter got response sorry hotel good location metro station bus stops taxi stations right outside front door breakfast buffet good plentiful

Reviews.Title: “Great value and location, happily recommend”
Reviews.Author: Chonner
Reviews.Content: stayed business colleagues march 2010 one colleagues stayed 9th floor suite absolutely excellent views facilities area stayed 4th floor inner facing room satisfactory buffet breakfast good value evening meals restaurant satisfactory sports bar expensive standard central location fountains bus stop directly outside aware barcelona plaza outside busy traffic

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location - rude staff!”
Reviews.Author: sheena g
Reviews.Content: husband chose hotel stay didnt disappoint blast nice friendly stuff especially reception helpfull always us answer questions excellent service tasty breakfast great location hotel everything close walking distance room bathroom great views pleasure stay hotel back next year bring friends us thank wonderful experience

Reviews.Title: “Good location and comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: Offaly R
Reviews.Content: well located plaza espanya busy place magical fountains right opposite hotel also metro station espanya well barcelona bus city tour bus stops bus stop airport outside hotel tourist places like montjuic park la rambla street quite near easily accessible metro buffet breakfast good value money good

Reviews.Title: “Perfect position”
Reviews.Author: FrancescaLeurini
Reviews.Content: one night barcelona got upgraded suite double 9th floor amazing views enormous bath shower two toiletries bedroom lots enormous bed room 8 seat conference table location good airport bus stops outside 5 euros airport probably cheaper return metro also good quality hotel facilities youd expect 4 star rooftop swimming pool didnt use rained unusual june gym left early couldnt enjoy breakfast look restaurant looked good reasonable prices classy decor warm welcoming staff could massage etc room pricey 80 euros one hour would recommend traveller needs comfort location great facilities business needs needs one place quality couldnt want downside rather official cold reception staff apart one helpful young lady didnt get warm welcome arrived asked later information also bed hard ceiling bath peeling ventilation english news channel tv would go right price boxes

Reviews.Title: “Needs some improvement for the price”
Reviews.Author: Kristin M
Reviews.Content: hotel one worst high quality hotel ever looks like old hotel country everything oldfashioned terribly sad enter huge access hall breakfast hall get large absolutely awful room wood surprisingly walking room noisy location probably positive thing subway front hotel entrance absolutely sure something much modern better barcelona

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jamiel0ve
Reviews.Content: first clean modern hotel rooms spacious bathrooms rooms city side amazing view plaza magic fountain pool roof also offers amazing views restaurant sports bar pub food metro stop literally right outside front door hotel breakfast huge included price charged extra breakfast service front desk staff helpful especially joel joel took time get know us joel super friendly informative went well beyond ensure treated well traveled lot stayed many hotels years us europe joel provided bet customer service ever hands ever go barcelona stay hotel disappoint

Reviews.Title: “Great location, needs some renovations and an attitude adjustment.”

Reviews.Content: company make reservation nice hotel location excellent front closed les rooms nice breakfast excellent best pool top wonderfull view

Reviews.Title: “Mariana Great location”

Reviews.Content: come easter holidays barcelona choose plaza hotel reviews good located nice staff big breakfast recomended

Reviews.Title: “Central Hotel”

Reviews.Content: hotel amazing base sightseeing barcelona excellent location less 3 metres metro stop key metro stop views windows across historic palace magic singing fountains well worth trip evening views amazing hotel pool chilly views across barcelona roof terrace amazing hotel staff friendly polite always greeting room cleaners couldnt helpful needed extra towels pillows breakfast choice excellent continental pastries breads meats cheeses fresh fruit station hot selection foods traditional sausages bacon wanting hotel use base sightseeing highly recommended close palace ten minute metro journey gothic city three stops ramblas best hotel

Reviews.Title: “Ice cream”

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel”

Reviews.Content: great place stay want see city metro bus taxi doorstep city centre near magical fountain must see night time music light show rooms big clean mini bar mini heater fact night could hear roof believe stayed top floor pool view room wasnt impressive didnt care wasnt day breakfast excellent staff helpful

Reviews.Title: “Great location, relatively inexpensive, good value for money”

Reviews.Content: awful awful awful hotel four star rating staff rude rooms average internet overpriced hotel staff obviously confident business nearby conference centre feel treat guests wish unfortunately hotel staff first barcelona luckily accommodation almost week moved another hotel barcelona also four star considerably cheaper friendly staff great facilities etc etc think stay stayed large group business reasons 99 people negative experience mainly staff attitude

Reviews.Title: “Unforgettable location, almost below average service”

Reviews.Content: 3 night stay 4star self appointed hotel turned average negatives positives positive side hotel well located espanya metro station various bus routes literally front door main foyer tidy well maintained checkin staff friendly enough overly helpful room 6th floor neat clean decent size pleasant view toward parc de de catalunya particularly spectacular lit night negative side firstly air conditioning room work next morning found shower also working reported problems reception told would call dont site deal type problems dont know returned evening find shower working apparently repaired air conditioning still dead reception help opening closing window temperature noise traffic room airconditioning repaired time left three days later received apology inconvenience checkout meal ordered room service also failed dry chips packet cooked might expect ordering hot meal area need repair renovation certainly longer standard shown pictures hotels website noted earlier review pay extras wifi inroom safe items others things board included standard many good hotels common european hotels also teacoffee making facilities room summary disappointing stay standard would normally expect 4star hotel

Reviews.Content: returned 4 days trip barcelona catalonia plaza hotel great first location go hotel stairs metro front plaza catalonia la ramblas 3 stations away comfortable fact sites within 34 stations poble fountains distance staff reception pleasent nice helpful hotel clean important us lobby comfortable nice room upper floor view magnificent even though street noisy didnt cause windows large convenient cleaned every morning breakfasts reach great variety eggs cheeses sausages even health corner milk healthy food overall would say great hotel barcelona great service perfect location great value money good luck

Reviews.Title: “Just about OK”
Reviews.Author: macks
Reviews.Content: stayed two different hotels madrid first one hotel 2 mins walk vincci capitol however looking forward vincci capitol stayed sister hotel great paid extra room terrace nice solid brick wall high sitting cant see room dark narrow long literally squeeze past end bed get wardrobe bathroom dark shape design sink example massive one end back corner turned water didnt go sink close tap lift let water nice really water used else leave massive hole could drop toothbrush bathroom needed major disappointed money previously mentioned check review hotel bar went couple times people even bar staff ring bell hope someone comes serve would think view would stunning bar 8th floor think high anyway windows view gran via filled massive dining table seat 20 people wouldnt sit two like reception ground floor foyer one sofa seat two people personally think hotel trying something isnt perhaps visited crazy bear really havent pulled said stay pleasant reception staff helpful bed comfy wouldnt stay better hotels madrid price despite excellent location

Reviews.Content: stayed two nights hotel great location heart madrid gran via famous spanish department store meters walk hotel retiro park royal palace walking distance well really good restaurants easy charge extra breakfast decided hotel negative comment make size room extremely small acceptable city tour day long

Reviews.Title: “Centrally Located”

Reviews.Content: friend pleasantly surprised lovely hotel room spacious bed comfortable staff helpful roof top lovely view main street hotel located heart city cant go wrong would recommend hotel havent visited madrid

Reviews.Title: “Modern hotel in a good location on Grand Via”

Reviews.Content: stayed two nights start trip pleasantly surprised real criticism would size room staff reception overly friendly room clean however location hotel could better central

Reviews.Title: “loved the hotel and will sure to be back and recommend it!”

Reviews.Content: married couple 15 year old daughter got back madrid 3 day break july 2012 hotel great location couple metro stations nearby food store next hotel located right middle everything well worth visit room triple good size beds pillows comfortable air conditioning although little bit noisy efficient good thing 30 stay roof terrace 7th floor lovely day evening phone order drinks around 3 euros soft drinks coffee take cost us 30 euros taxi hotel took 1520 mins slightly negative comment could make hotel rooms decor looking bit old wouldve liked tea coffee making facilities room bathroom clean would recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “definitely use again perfect location”

Reviews.Content: room great awesome view gran via main road city center nice roof terrace

Reviews.Title: “Right in the heart of Madrid.....”

Reviews.Content: pleasantly surprised hotel pretty nice reasonable price hotelscom room clean location great literally right front metro station easy access airport hour less 3 euros think terrace really experience made good use relaxing great summer night long day work unfortunately free wifi room 7th floor local brought great restaurant 10 mins away walking may need reservations name la de san 30 definitely highlight trip terms food

Reviews.Title: “Fab hotel brilliant views over Madrid”
Reviews.Author: Rosie91
Reviews.Content: great hotel located gran via central comfortable bedroom bathroom good size walking distance shopping main whilst also close 3 underground stations one right outside nevertheless iron room requested one reception told hotel one used laundry service iron press 2 items clothing charged 20 euros beware reception staff rude welcome arrival checkout great

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel”

Reviews.Content: nice modern stylish hotel bang middle madrid breakfasts nice bar good stocked bottled beer closes 10pm week anyway front desk staff bit could speak good english bar restaurant staff nice would recommend location relaxed atmosphere

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful building”

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay”

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, great location”

Reviews.Content: came mother arrived one came help carry luggage somewhat also staff speak english even try help us since didnt speak spanish rooms nicely decorated shower horrendous glass shower tiles loose leaked everywhere use bathtub didnt want bathroom checking receive load luggage trolley elevators tiny got stuck could exit elevator even called help spanish one came help get trolley elevator could exit say vincci capitol great location madrid right outside callao metro station quarter mile sol literally center madrid

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Amazing Location. All you can ask for”
Reviews.Author: theboysi
Reviews.Content: hotel centrally located interesting art deco design features rooms spacious showers bit due glass door design supply plenty towels staff helpful breakfast buffet delightful varied fruits cheeses breads

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel.”

Reviews.Content: beautiful location rooms kept clean maintenance issues eg shower door much use water leaked bit whilst shower wardrobe door didnt shut properly things minor didnt bother us even though hotel located gran via busy night didnt hear thing outside spa absolutely amazing would definitely recommend staff friendly spoke good english would definitely stay

Reviews.Content: booked package vacation madrid barcelona several months travel date fantastic deal price paid happy hotel hotel modern lighting etc convenient light set lighting push button two amazing views madrid location incredibly convenient boyfriend walked almost everywhere one disappointment hotel advertised free internet turns thats wired internet bring ipad travels like useless apparently theres wifi lobby didnt work also would nice pool thats huge deal still highly recommend place

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location and helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: ENikolaou
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 3 nights october slightly disappointed hotel staff welcome us arrived seemed bored disinterested checking us even though made every effort speak spanish room 8th floor terrace terrace great south facing especially weather hot overall square room ie rooms roof tiny barely walk round bed get bathroom room clean well maintained unfortunately tv didnt work properly maybe due high experienced bed also uncomfortable air con took long time get going hotel spa euros yes use 1 hour outrageous assumed free mention charge used book hotel location fantastic right heart gran via easy walking distance major attractions like plaza mayor san market shops hotel disappointment partly cancelled amazing view terrace looking book would say roof terrace really appealing aspect hotel quite expensive doesnt really feel like 45 star hotel claims

Reviews.Content: much enjoyed stay vincci capitol hotel via madrid service arrival prompt courteous staff friendly helpful rooms comfortable clean quiet addition could asked better location overall impressed pleased hotel choice

Reviews.Title: “Good location, uncomfortable room”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights october 2012 close callao metro station hotel busy gran via road short walk many main tourist spots royal palace 10mins plaza mayor 15 mins prado 20 mins hotel quite dark 6th floor view drink sun terrace although next busy road central found quiet staff great reviewers bathroom clean tidy shower nightmare turns bathroom wet room overall great trip great food madrid fantastic

Reviews.Title: “Great Location in Madrid”
Reviews.Author: 2FunTrippers
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel september 14 september 17 2011 mixed hotel liked things hotel others liked great location gran via next callao metro station within walkable distance main tourist attractions also liked staff front desk efficient accommodating also liked size room modern decor comfortable beds however lacked suitcases extremely difficult system loved beautiful stylish spotless bathroom weird glass shower curtain bath towels also like extremely dirty balcony full cigarette go back madrid next year could stay hotel minor

Reviews.Title: “really enjoyed stay here”

Reviews.Content: perfect location tourists location traffic noise saturday night noise hotel give nice city views located literally across street metro station easy walking tapas bars shopping perhaps 20 minutes prado english desk staff good room comfortable

Reviews.Title: “PERFECT location, excellent facilities, good value and...”
